term.title: centrifugal acceleration

item.text: The acceleration of a component as a result of a uniform rotational motion. Centrifugal acceleration is a vector quantity.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 897. 'Quantities and units for centrifugation in the clinical laboratory (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 900 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466040897)
